des: "This sweet and creamy butter is great on sweet potatoes, waffles, and French toast.   This butter is the only way I can get my husband to eat sweet potatoes!"
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the butter, brown sugar, maple syrup and pumpkin pie spice until well blended. Chill in the refrigerator, for about 30 minutes. Form into a roll using waxed paper and store wrapped. It can be frozen for later at this point if desired.
